<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/pet"}></MethodEndpoint>

ounces","example":3.14,"multipleOf":0.01}}></SchemaItem></TabItem></DiscriminatorTabs></div></div></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"application/xml"} value={"application/xml"}><details
